vdb.name: CountryInfoServiceVDB
vdb.description: Shows how to call CountryInfoService Web Services

model.name: CountryInfoServiceView
model.metadata: CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE BEGIN SELECT XMLELEMENT(NAME tns:CapitalCity, XMLNAMESPACES( 'http://www.oorsprong.org/websamples.countryinfo' AS tns), XMLELEMENT(NAME sCountryISOCode, CountryInfoServiceView.CapitalCity_request.sCountryISOCode)) AS xml_out; END
